projects.title: React based Expense Tracker
projects.description: The React-based expense tracker utilizes Bootstrap for a polished and responsive design, allowing users to effortlessly manage their finances. With features such as expense categorization and detailed summaries, it provides a user-friendly experience for individuals to take control of their expenses.

projects.title: Star Wars API Tracker App
projects.description: The Star Wars API app built with React and Bootstrap offers an immersive experience for fans, allowing them to explore and retrieve information about characters, films, and starships from the Star Wars universe. With a visually appealing design and responsive layout, users can easily navigate through the app and discover fascinating details about their favorite Star Wars elements.
